alfredsnippet.snippet:
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

power = np.sum(data**2, axis=0)
power /= np.min(power)
ax = plt.gca()
ax.plot(power, 'x')
ax.set_ylim([0, 16])
fig = plt.gcf()
fig.set_size_inches(16, 4)
plt.show()

for index in range(32):
    ax = plt.subplot(4, 8, index+1)
    ax.plot(data[::100, index])
    ax.set_xticks([])
    plt.title('chan %02d' % index)
fig = plt.gcf()
fig.set_size_inches(16, 8)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
alfredsnippet.name: channel subplot
